summary: No end-of-day bundle files were provided for 2026-01-30. As a result, no quantitative analysis of trading performance, market regime, or sector context could be performed. This report reflects a critical data gap.

regime_context.notes: No attribution or exit attribution data available to determine market regime.

sector_context.notes: No trade data available to determine sector performance.

recommendations.title: Ensure EOD Bundle Files Are Present
recommendations.body: The 8 canonical EOD bundle files are essential for quantitative review. Please ensure these files are generated and accessible at the expected location for future analysis.

recommendations.title: Verify File Paths and Generation Process
recommendations.body: Investigate why the EOD bundle files for 2026-01-30 were not found. Confirm the correct paths and that the `stock-bot` and related processes are generating these files as expected.

falsification_criteria.description: The 8 canonical EOD bundle files for 2026-01-30 are found in the expected directory.
The located EOD bundle files contain valid, non-empty JSONL/JSON content.
